t: Amazon Clinic expands nationwide to provide messaging and video visits for common health conditions
s: With Amazon Clinic, customers in all 50 states and Washington, D.C. can receive convenient, affordable, and trusted care from the comfort of home.

t: Amazon brings Amazon Clinic, One Medical under a single brand
s: Amazon One Medical now offers customers two ways to get convenient, high-quality health care: Pay-per-visit telehealth for 30+ common conditions (like pink eye, the flu, or a sinus infection), or Membership where customers pay a monthly or annual fee for on-demand virtual care, easy booking ...

t: Amazon Health | In-Person/Online Urgent Care | Prescriptions

t: Amazon Clinic Is Now Amazon One Medical | Amazon One Medical
s: With Amazon One Medical Pay-per-visit, you get the virtual care services you enjoyed from Amazon Clinic, including prescriptions and 24/7 on-demand care – now at lower prices.

t: Introducing Amazon Clinic, a virtual health service that delivers convenient, affordable care for common conditions
s: November 15, 2022 - Amazon Clinic will operate in 32 states and provide virtual care for more than 20 common health conditions, such as allergies, acne, and hair loss.

t: What is Amazon Clinic? Here's what to know about how to use it.
s: February 14, 2023 - Amazon Clinic rolled out in November for people ages 18-to-64. It’s available in 33 states and offers digital care for 24 common health condition.

January 4, 2025 - Customers in 34 states can use messaging to consult a medical clinician about 20 common conditions, such as acne, pink eye, migraine, and erectile dysfunction. Once the consultation is complete, patients have the option of filling any prescriptions through Amazon Pharmacy for home delivery.
